author: IGN
title: Look at that 6-pack drink animation… #gta6 #gtavi #grandtheftauto #graphics #gta #animation #ign

author: IGN
description:
Andor Season 2, Episodes 7-9, reviewed by Clint Gage.

Andor season 2 continues to defy the traditions of Star Wars while still living squarely and thoughtfully in a crowded section of the canon. The Ghorman Massacre takes its place as a crucial moment in the galaxy’s history, by giving the franchise a memorable and moving sequence of Imperial destruction that was impossible to avoid.
title: Andor Season 2, Episodes 7-9 Review

author: IGN
description:
Get a peek at the mystery and check out gameplay from Thief's Shelter in this trailer for the upcoming first-person psychological mystery about a police investigation that blurs reality and madness. Thief’s Shelter is coming soon to PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch. A demo for Thief's Shelter is out now on Steam.

In Thief's Shelter, step into the troubled mind of James, a detective tasked with solving an unusual murder at Highburn Mansion. Once players start the investigation, they will quickly realize the mansion is changing and playing tricks on James, quickly deteriorating his already vulnerable mental state and making him question what’s real.
title: Thief's Shelter - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week Daemon is joined by Podcast Unlocked's Ryan McCaffrey and IGN's Executive Tech Editor, Bo Moore, to talk GTA 6's influence on the PS5 Pro. Will Sony's latest Pro console get a bump in sales because of GTA 6, considering it'll be the best way to play the game until the inevitable PC release? And we take a look at Microsoft's new pricing strategy for the Xbox Series X and S and all the accessories. The strategy: everything costs more now. And, will PlayStation follow suit and raise prices on their hardware? They've done it in other markets, will the U.S. be next? Plus we have last week's poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.
And don't forget to join us for IGN's second annual IGN Live, a huge in-person event held in Downtown Los Angeles. You can get tickets at IGN.com/Live and use promo code NGCW for a discount.

#IGN #GTA6 #Gaming
title: GTA 6: Why PS5 Pro Should Be the Best Way To Play - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Tired of failing lockpicking in The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered? In this guide, we show you exactly how to get the Skeleton Key, a Daedric artifact that makes lockpicking a thing of the past. From leveling up quickly to completing Nocturnal’s quest, this step-by-step walkthrough will get you the ultimate thief’s tool in no time.

In this guide, you'll learn how to quickly reach Level 10, find Nocturnal’s shrine, and complete the Eye of Nocturnal quest step-by-step. We’ll also cover essential tips and tricks for using the Skeleton Key effectively—and as a bonus, how to make sure you don’t lose it if you end up in jail.

00:00 - Intro  
00:30 - Reach Level 10  
00:41 - Quick Leveling Tips  
01:33 - Start Nocturnal’s Daedric Quest  
01:57 - Investigate in Leyawiin  
03:06 - What the Skeleton Key Does  
03:29 - Why You Should Keep Lockpicks Handy

#IGN #Gaming #Oblivion
title: Oblivion Remastered: How to Get the Skeleton Key Quickly!

author: IGN
description: Check out the Accolades Trailer for Tempest Rising, a 3D real-time strategy base-building game developed by Splitgate Ironworks. Players will enter the fight for resources after a nuclear war lays waste to Earth. Take a look at the latest trailer to garner the critical reception for Tempest Rising, available now for PC (Steam).
title: Tempest Rising - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet the adorable creatures, learn about the story, and step into the charming fantasy world of Hawthorn in this new trailer for the upcoming co-op sandbox RPG sim. Hawthorn is coming to PC. A Kickstarter campaign for Hawthorn is available now.

Hawthorn is set in a realm where humble woodland fairytale creatures chase adventure. Where ancient myths seemingly stir just beneath the moss and roots, and where stories and rumors grow like ivy. Hawthorn is part epic adventure, part cozy day-in-the-life. Think Skyrim meets Stardew Valley, told through the lens of classic fairytale storybooks like Wind in the Willows, Beatrix Potter series, Brothers Grimm and fantasy adventure books like Redwall, Lord of the Rings, and Mouse Guard.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hawthorn - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get another terrifying look at Zoochosis in this exclusive gameplay trailer for the bodycam horror simulation game. In Zoochosis, you’re a zookeeper. Identify infected mutant animals, make a vaccine, and cure them. Will you save all of them and survive? Zoochosis is available now on Steam. It is coming soon to Epic Games Store, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and PS4 (PlayStation 4).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Zoochosis - Exclusive Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Stash and Dash is a new property that was introduced to the BETA branch just a few weeks ago in Schedule 1, and since the branch is currently accessible to all players, you can jump in right now and start exploring this potentially game-changing storage unit. Here’s everything you need to know about it. 
00:00 - Intro  
00:18 - Stash and Dash Cost and Location  
00:54 - Stash and Dash Features and Setup  
01:30 - Stash and Dash Nearby Resources  
02:00 - Outro
title: Schedule I: Stash and Dash Is a Must-Have – Here’s Why!

author: IGN
description: Get ready for an all new trailer, behind-the-scenes information, and a deeper dive into the world of Mafia: The Old Country Developer Panel at PAX East on May 8th at 11am. Just how far Enzo Favara is willing to go in order to prove his worth to the Cosa Nostra? Tune in to find out!
title: Mafia: The Old Country Developer Panel at PAX East

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Early Access Launch Trailer for La Quimera, an action first-person shooter developed by Reburn. Players will make use of an advanced exosuit and high-powered weaponry to battle in the Latin American megalopolis of Nuevo Caracas and beyond. Embark on a journey about a down-on-their-luck PMC group caught up in a vast conflict between rival factions and shadowy corporations, as mystical events increasingly blur the line between reality and illusion. La Quimera is available now on PC via Steam Early Access.

#LaQuimera #Gaming #IGN
title: La Quimera - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy the launch trailer for Wings of Endless, a new side-scrolling pixel-art platformer/action-RPG that puts you in the 8-bit boots of a bounty hunter and his talking-owl companion. Check it out on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2666610/Wings_of_Endless/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Wings of Endless - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Rockstar Games recently released Trailer 2 for the hotly anticipated Grand Theft Auto 6, alongside a bunch of other GTA 6 related videos, screenshots, artworks, and more! So, we've collected them all and put together this handy Grand Theft Auto VI video, showing both Trailer 1, Trailer 2, and the brand new video clips, plus more, all together in a lovely GTA VI package.

From cutscene video snippets of both Lucia Caminos, and Jason Duval, to postcards of locations like Vice City, Leonida Keys, Grassrivers, Port Gellhorn, Ambrosia, Mount Kalaga National Park, and more!

There's plenty to see, including Rockstar's distinctive character artwork, with Boobie Ike, Brian Heder, Cal Hampton, DreQuan Priest, Raul Bautista, Real Dimez, plus others, all making an appearance! What GTA 6 hidden details, and easter eggs, have you spotted in these trailers and gameplay screenshots? Let us know!

The GTA 6 release date is May 26th, 2026, and will be available on PS5, and Xbox Series X|S console syst
title: GTA 6: Every Trailer and Screenshot So Far

author: IGN
description: If you want a class that's all about poise breaking jump attacks, charged blows, and powering through enemy attacks to deal a big one of your own, the Raider might be the nightfarer for you. Check out our early impressions of the Raider as part of our ongoing coverage of Elden Ring: Nightreign, as IGN First continues all throughout the month of May.
title: Elden Ring: Nightreign - Raider Hands-On Video Impressions - IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Honey Don't! trailer for this upcoming dark comedy film about Honey O’Donahue, a small-town private investigator, who delves into a series of strange deaths tied to a mysterious church. Honey Don't! stars Margaret Qualley, Aubrey Plaza, Charlie Day, Billy Eichner, and Chris Evans. 

Honey Don't! is produced by Ethan Coen, Tricia Cooke, Robert Graf, Tim Bevan, and Eric Fellner. It is written by Ethan Coen & Tricia Cooke.

Honey Don't!, directed by Ethan Coen, opens in theaters nationwide on August 22, 2025, following a world premiere at the 2025 Cannes Film Festival.

#HoneyDont #Movies #IGN
title: Honey Don't! - Official Trailer (2025) Margaret Qualley, Chris Evans, Aubrey Plaza

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Giant-Size Hive Mind Round 2 Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the hit hero team-based shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players will be able to access Giant-Size Hive Mind Mode, which enables the heroes of the Marvel universe to not only have big heads but also duplicates of one another as well, to make for a chaotic, fun party game mode. Giant-Size Hive Mind Round 2 for Marvel Rivals is launching on May 9.

#MarvelRivals #GiantSizeHiveMind #Gaming
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Giant-Size Hive Mind Round 2 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Fortnite Galactic Battle gameplay trailer. Leia, Luke, and Han Solo will arrive on the Island on May 8, 2025. Additionally, Hologram Mace Windu will appear, and you can train with him to earn a Purple Lightsaber and learn Force Pull, which pulls in just about anything and anyone nearby. Sith Lord Darth Maul will also appear as a hologram, offering red lightsabers and teaching Force Throw, where you can pick up objects around you and throw them as projectiles.

#Fortnite #StarWars #Gaming
title: Fortnite - Official Galactic Battle 'Pull of the Force' Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Adapted from master storyteller Stephen King’s first-written novel and directed by Francis Lawrence, the visionary director behind The Hunger Games film franchise (Catching Fire, Mockingjay – Pts. 1 & 2, and The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes), this intense, chilling, and emotional thriller film challenges audiences to confront a haunting question – how far could you go?

The film features powerful ensemble cast of young stars on the rise and legends such as Cooper Hoffman (Saturday Night, Licorice Pizza), David Jonsson (Alien: Romulus), Ben Wang (Karate Kid: Legends), Charlie Plummer (Looking For Alaska), Garrett Wareing (Manifest) and Tut Nyuot (The Witcher: Blood Origin), alongside Judy Greer and Mark Hamill.

Lionsgate presents, in association with Media Capital Technologies, a Vertigo Entertainment / about: blank production, The Long Walk, directed by Francis Lawrence, screenplay by JT Mollner, based on the novel by Stephen King.

The Long Walk debuts only in theaters on September
title: The Long Walk - Official Trailer (2025) Mark Hamill, Cooper Hoffman, David Jonsson

author: IGN
description: For now, EVE Vanguard is still a lot of "wills," "shoulds," and " hope tos." It is playable, and the gunplay feels a bit unpolished still, but satisfying. The environments are impressive, and the weapon designs are diverse and bombastic. It's just hard to get the full picture without actually experiencing how it will tie into the EVE Online shared universe or the social features, which are definitely the most exciting part of the whole idea. Previewed by Leana Hafer
title: EVE Vanguard Makes A Lot of Big Promises, But Delivers Good Gunplay

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Get Ready for Elena!' Fighting Pass Trailer for Street Fighter 6, an action fighting game developed by Capcom. Players can soon gain access to the next Fighting Pass that is fitted with a suite of Street Fighter 3-themed items such as avatar gears inspired by Yun, Yang, Q, Remy, and Oro. Elena's handstand emote and stickers featuring Urien, Dudley, Sean, and more are also included in the upcoming pass. The 'Get Ready for Elena!' Fighting Pass for Street Fighter 6 is launching on June 5 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#StreetFighter6 #Gaming #IGN
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official 'Get Ready for Elena!' Fighting Pass Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the opening 18 minutes from Pixelshire, the imminent RPG sandbox launching on May 8 that sprinkles town-building, combat, exploration, and life-sim elements on top of its charming pixel-art graphics. Check it out on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1846720/Pixelshire/
title: Pixelshire: The First 18 Minutes

title: Could GTA 6’s map be so big that there are 2 international airports?! #gta6 #gtavi #trailer #details

author: IGN
description:
GTA 6 Trailer 2 is here! The second trailer for Grand Theft Auto 6 has arrived, and we've analysed all of the PlayStation footage, to uncover the 89 hidden, hard-to-find details, and easter eggs littered throughout this second look at Grand Theft Auto VI by Rockstar Games.

There are plenty of cool new things to notice, clues, and secrets within this brand-new GTA 6 trailer, and we're here to examine them in this deep dive! From character details involving Jason Duval, and Lucia Caminos (our supposed dual protagonists in GTA 6), to map locations such as Vice City, Leonida Keys, Grassrivers, Port Gellhorn, Ambrosia and Mount Kalaga, plus more!

The GTA 6 release date is May 26th, 2026, and will be available on PS5, and Xbox Series X|S console systems.

For more on Grand Theft Auto 6, check out our video on the 99 Details From the GTA 6 Trailer

https://youtu.be/bMq4OtZTigk?si=3Z5jKE1Xp0LypGk8

#GTA6 #GTA #Gaming
title: 89 Details From GTA 6 Trailer 2

author: IGN
title: Jason & Lucia being in love is a nice change after Michael, Franklin, Trevor in GTA 5. #gta6 #ign

author: IGN
description:
Rockstar just dropped the second Grand Theft Auto 6 trailer, and the GTFM crew is diving deep into all the new locations revealed. From sun-soaked beaches to gritty backroads, we explore every new environment shown off in Vice City and beyond. What do these locations mean for the story, gameplay, and worldbuilding in GTA 6? Check out our full breakdown, and stay tuned to GTFM for everything GTA 6!


00:00:00 - Clevelander Hotel & Phil's Ammu-Nation
00:03:03 - Trailer Breakdown & Reaction
00:10:40 - Vice City
00:13:10 - Leonida Keys
00:14:17 - Grassrivers
00:15:13 - Port Gellhorn
00:17:16 - Mount Kalaga National Park
00:18:32 - Final Thoughts & Outro

#IGN #GTA6 #Gaming
title: What GTA 6 Locations Reveal About the Game's Secrets | GTFM
